summary: In California, a Mexican-American is falsely accused of killing the farmer he was working for, after the racist farmer stiffed his immigrant employee with a bad check.
cast: Shelley Winters|Ricardo Montalban|Wendell Corey|Claire Trevor|Robert Burton|José Torvay|Jack Elam|Pascual García Peña|George Chandler|Juan Torena|Carlos Conde|Jay Adler|Billie Bird|Ralph Brooks|Cliff Clark|Fred Coby|Tristram Coffin|Jack Daly|Alan Dexter|Jimmy Dime|Dennis Frazer|Tom Greenway|Dabbs Greer|James Harrison|Jim Hayward|Edward Hearn|John Indrisano|Earl Lee|Peter Leeds|George Lynn|John McKee|Tyler McVey|Russell Meeker|Joseph Mell|Rhea Mitchell|Lillian Molieri|Ralph Moody|Lee Phelps|Philip Van Zandt|Martha Wentworth
title: My Man and I
